title: Engraved or possibly calligraphic?
content:
Similarities to Belwe and Brioso Pro, among others.  
What the font couldn't even come that close, so I'm turning to you to save me as I need to rebuild the logo reversing the lines top for bottom.

Many thanks.

Font: 

 Catull
